title: I can only have 1 spell on champ
body: Just as title says. I'm new to the game and I have no idea how to put a 2nd spell on Ashe. I see the 2 boxes after picking a champ, but when I click on the empty box nothing happens. I have one spell equipped, which is heal.

replies.body: Hey, welcome back!  It seems like your account might have had a summoner spell that no longer exists, and as a result is experiencing this bug.  While a fix is being worked on, I've sent your account info up to our platform team who should be able to manually resolve this for you.  Unfortunately, I don't have an ETA to offer and I know this absolutely sucks, but hopefully it will be in no time.  Hang tight!
I have the same problem. Any hero that I choose only has 1 spell, and it's very annoying
I have the same problem too help please
I have same problam pls help me
Same issue here...new player..never played before and now level 8...Still can only choose one spell...{{champion:119}}
Yeah im having the same issue. Pls help
